intro.text: Cashed casino is an online gambling site for Canadian players that has a lot of games and bonuses in a safe digital space. The site is known for its modern look and easy-to-use layout. items: Fill in personal details (name, date of birth)

Some of these include Visa and Mastercard (minimum C$20), Interac e-Transfer (minimum C$10), Neosurf and Paysafecard (minimum C$15), Jeton, MiFinity, Cash2Code, and a number of important cryptocurrencies, such as Bitcoin, Binance Coin, Litecoin, Dogecoin, Tether, Ethereum, and more. Withdrawal Methods.text: Cashed casino Canada has a number of trustworthy choices for withdrawals, however Skrill and Neteller are not among them. Players can withdraw via Interac e-Transfer (minimum C$10), bank transfer, Jeton, MiFinity, Cash2Code, and the same set of cryptocurrencies, such as Bitcoin, Binance Coin, Litecoin, Dogecoin, Ethereum, and others. Most of the time, you can only take out C$10 to C$15 (more for other crypto ways, like Bitcoin, which is roughly C$60). The most you can take out in one transaction is C$5,000. For e-wallets like Jeton/MiFinity and crypto alternatives, Cashed casino withdrawal time can happen in as little as 24–48 hours.

Cashed Casino Bonus Offers and Promotion.text: Cashed Casino provides a variety of bonuses and promos with clear amounts, wagering requirements, and qualifying criteria to benefit new and returning players.

New players get a 100% match on their first deposit, up to C$500, plus 200 free spins that may be used when they make a deposit of at least C$20. You have to bet 35 times the total of your deposit and bonus within 30 days. You also have to bet 40 times the amount you earn from free spins within the same time frame. Every day, 40 spins are offered on a featured slot like Book of Dead, and each spin is worth C$0.10. You may only bet up to C$5 every round. If you go above this limit, you lose your bonus money and any winnings that go with it.

Instead of the matching bonus, those who make their initial deposit can choose to get 10% back on their net losses up to C$200. Players must make a minimum deposit of C$30 and contact support within 24 hours of their first session to get their money back. The next day, cashback is credited as cash that may be withdrawn, but you have to meet a 1× rollover in seven days. If you claim any other bonus on the same deposit, the offer is instantly worthless.

From Monday to Thursday, if you deposit C$20 or more, you get 50 free spins on a revolving spotlight slot. Each spin is worth C$0.20 and you have to bet 40 times. Players who deposit C$50 or more over the weekend may get a 50% reload bonus worth up to C$700 and 50 extra free spins. You have ten days to bet both the reload cash and the deposit 35 times. Free-spin wins follow the usual 40 times regulation. You may only bet a maximum of C$5 per spin or gaming round while clearing either promotion.
Live Casino Cashback and Cashed Casino Promo Code

Real-time table fans may get 25% of their weekly net loses reimbursed in cash, up to C$200. Calculating losses happens from Monday from 00:00 to Sunday at 23:59 (UTC), and reimbursements are given out every Monday. Cashback is given as a bonus balance with a 1× wagering requirement, so players may withdraw their money after just one qualifying round. This Cashed casino no deposit bonus is only good for live games, and you lose it if you have another live-casino bonus at the same time.
Sports Welcome Bonus and Cashed Casino Bonus Code

If you wager at Cashed Casino and make a deposit of at least C$20, you can get a 100% match on your initial deposit up to C$200. You need to choose this option on the cashier page. You have to play through the bonus and deposit five times on single bets with odds of at least 2.00, or six times on accumulators where each leg has to be priced at 1.50 or higher. You have 30 days to place your bets, and the maximum amount you may bet on each slip is C$50 until the rollover is fulfilled. Cash-out choices don't add to the total amount wagered.

You get one loyalty point for every C$20 you bet on slots, C$40 on live games, or C$60 on sports. You can use these points in the Bonus Shop to get free spins, match bonuses, or cash vouchers starting at 25 points. As you go up through the five VIP tiers, you get more and more privileges, including as cash awards for leveling up, custom monthly reloads, higher withdrawal limits (up to C$50,000 per transaction at the top tier), a personal account manager, and weekly cashback that may exceed 20%. Every month, VIP status is checked, and to keep it, users must satisfy a points goal instead of a money goal. This makes sure that both casual and high-volume gamers may access it fairly.

Support.text: 24/7 support is available by live chat and email, with typical wait times of under 5 minutes for chat and under 1 business day for email. Although no phone line is available, agents can escalate account-specific banking or bonus issues to a risk team. The CRM system maintains a transcript history, allowing for follow-ups from earlier answers.

CASINO FAQ.text: Is there a maximum win limit on Cashed Casino bonuses?
Yes, for some promotions, the maximum win from free spins or bonus funds is capped at C$10,000 unless otherwise specified in the bonus terms.
Can I reverse a withdrawal request?
Yes, pending withdrawals can be reversed within the processing window by accessing the "Cashier" section and selecting "Cancel Withdrawal."
Are there game restrictions during bonus wagering?
Yes, certain games like jackpot slots and specific table games may be excluded from bonus wagering. The full list is available in the bonus terms.
Does Cashed Casino accept VPN access?
No, using a VPN to access the platform may violate the terms of service and can result in account suspension or forfeiture of winnings.
How do I earn loyalty points?
You earn points by wagering: C$20 on slots = 1 point, C$40 on live games = 1 point, and C$60 on sports = 1 point. Points can be exchanged in the Bonus Shop.
